entry.def: Butterscotch is a hard yellowish-brown sweet made from butter and sugar boiled together.

entry.tran: 有奶油硬糖味的东西；黄褐色的东西
entry.def: A butterscotch flavoured or coloured thing has the flavour or colour of butterscotch.

means.word_mean: 1. a hard brittle candy made with butter and brown sugar
